item.title: How i make a place safe?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

brandonxbran:

sorry i dont know but would u mind showing me or telling me how to make it when u die u go to edge not in a glitched spot? when ppl die in wild it takes them to lava in wild 53 and uc ant move, i think someone messed up on edge and lava code bc they r almsot same codes but edge is y- 3490 nnot 3940. i dont know where to chnage it. add me on msn if u can pls. brandonxbran@live.com

You already posted a thread, be patient. We offer support voluntarily, so don’t expect us to hurry up for you.

@Author:
You need to do it like so:

You get the X,Y pos of the top right of where you want to make wild/non-wild. and the bottom left X,Y coords.

Then you do:

if ((absX >= BOTTOM_LEFT_X && absX <= TOP_RIGHT_X) &&
        (absY >= BOTTOM_LEFT_Y && absY <= TOP_RIGHT_Y)) {
    ...
}

item.title: How i make a place safe?
item.dc:creator: @killer_sock killer sock
item.description:
@killer_sock wrote:

i know i should search for nonwild i searched for that and got this:
public boolean nonWildPvP() {
if (absX >= 3204 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}

but i dont get what i should put were etc here i kno that absX= the x coords and absY = the Y coords but i dont know what i should do and all help would be great!
